metadata.title: CVE-2020-1746 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine affecting Ansible Engine versions2.7.x before 2.7.17 and 2.8.x before 2.8.11 and 2.9.x before 2.9.7 as wellas Ansible Tower before and including versions 3.4.5 and 3.5.5 and 3.6.3when the ldap_attr and ldap_entry community modules are used. The issuediscloses the LDAP bind password to stdout or a log file if a playbook taskis written using the bind_pw in the parameters field. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is data confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.9.7+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.7+dfsg-1').
